name: Nike Air Max Plus Grey University Blue Black
Nike Air Max Plus Triple Black

details.description:
The Nike Air Max Plus Triple Black is an all-black rendition of the Nike Air Max Plus. Released ahead of the 20th anniversary of the Nike Air Max Plus, this shoe features a breathable synthetic upper with closed mesh inserts as well as edgy TPU ribbing, an external toe cap, a textured ankle strip, and a low mudguard. It also features a lightweight midsole with Tuned Air technology and a Max Air sole unit.

The Nike Air Max Plus Triple Black was released on December 20, 2017. At the time of its release, it retailed for $150.

name: Nike Air Max Plus White

details.description:
The Nike Air Max Plus White is a versatile shoe, ideal for everyday use and an active lifestyle. There is air cushioning on the heels and forefront, allowing for full-length cushion and support. The ankles are also well-supported. The wavy design lines are complemented with the plastic accents and breathable mesh on the upper of the shoe. The shoe also features colored air pods to provide a touch of contrast, and the all-white color of the Nike Air Plus White gives it a clean look.

The Nike Air Max Plus White was released in January of 2019 for $150.

name: Nike Air Max Plus OG Hyper Blue

details.description:
The Nike Air Max Plus OG Hyper Blue is a striking revival of a classic silhouette that continues to captivate sneaker enthusiasts. This iconic model showcases a bold color scheme, featuring a gradient upper that transitions from black to hyper blue, creating a visually stunning effect. The shoe's design is further enhanced by its signature wavy TPU overlays, which not only contribute to its distinctive aesthetic but also provide structural support.

Built for both style and comfort, the Air Max Plus OG Hyper Blue incorporates Nike's renowned Air cushioning technology in both the heel and forefoot. This innovative system offers superior impact protection and responsive cushioning, making it ideal for all-day wear. The mesh upper ensures breathability, while the padded collar and tongue provide a snug, comfortable fit. Completed with a durable rubber outsole featuring a unique traction pattern, this sneaker delivers excellent grip on various surfaces.

Our team thinks this product is great for those seeking a perfect blend of retro style and modern performance. The Air Max Plus OG Hyper Blue offers unparalleled comfort and head-turning looks, making it an essential addition to any sneaker collection.

name: Nike Air Max Plus Shark Attack

details.description: The Nike Air Max Plus Shark Attack is a bold and eye-catching addition to the iconic Air Max line. Drawing inspiration from the ocean's most feared predator, this sneaker features a sleek black upper with striking Baltic Blue accents that evoke the image of a shark cutting through dark waters. The shoe's design incorporates the classic Air Max Plus silhouette, known for its distinctive wavy TPU overlays, which in this iteration resemble shark fins, adding to the aquatic theme. Comfort and performance are at the forefront of this design, with Nike's renowned Air cushioning technology providing exceptional support and responsiveness. The shoe's upper combines breathable mesh with durable synthetic materials, ensuring both ventilation and durability for everyday wear. The Shark Attack colorway not only makes a statement visually but also pays homage to the Air Max Plus's legacy of pushing boundaries in sneaker design. Our experts state this product is great for sneaker enthusiasts looking to make a bold fashion statement while enjoying the comfort and performance of a classic Air Max silhouette. The unique shark-inspired design sets it apart from other sneakers, making it a standout choice for those who want to add a touch of aquatic flair to their footwear collection.

name: Nike Air Max Plus Sunset (2024)

details.description:
The Nike Air Max Plus Sunset (2024) is a special-edition of the "Sunset" colorway, which has been released numerous times over the years throughout the history of the Nike Air Max Plus.

The wave-like upper has TPU overlays that resembles waves in the sea as the sun sets. Aiming to mimic and capture all phases of a sunset, you’ll notice how the colors gradient from a bright Ceramic Yellow in the toe area all the way to a deep dark pimento in the heel area. Together with other colors such as black, resin, and white, the effect is nothing less than spectacular. On the quarter side panels, you’ll spot small red Nike Swooshes, while iconic Tuned Air (TN) logos sit on the heel, on the insole, and underfoot in the middle of the outsole.

What our experts love about this shoe is how the Air Units complement the idea of a sunset, the orange color peeking through adds to the overall aesthetic. When it was released on July 3, 2024, the Nike Air Max Plus Sunset (2024) had a $180 price tag.

name: Nike Air Max Plus Golf PGA Championship
Nike Air Max Plus Triple Black Leather

details.description:
The Nike Air Max Plus Triple Black Leather is a blacked-out rendition of the classic Nike Air Max Plus, first released in 1998.

This low-top silhouette features an upper constructed with a mix of suede and leather. The suede makes up the base of the upper, while the leather makes up the overlays. It features wavy embroidered lines like the original Nike Air Max Plus and a glossy toe cap on its toe tip that adds shine and durability. Braced by a midfoot shank, this blacked-out sneaker sits atop a Nike Max Air unit and a rubber outsole. Branding-wise, it features Swooshes on its sides and TN branding on its heel.

What do our experts love about this shoe? The most impressive feature of this shoe is the Max Air Unit. Originally designed for improved running performance, this unit enhances the shoe’s cushioning. The Nike Air Max Plus Triple Black Leather was released on April 19th, 2018. Originally, it retailed at $160.

name: Nike Air Max Plus SE Night Maroon Metallic Silver (Women's)
Nike Air Max Plus 25th Anniversary

details.description:
The Nike Air Max Plus 25th Anniversary was released to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the original Nike Air Max Plus. This commemorative sneaker features a color scheme and design that pay tribute to prominent Air Max colorways, including "Palm," "Hyper Blue," "Fireberry," and "Sanguine."

Like other Air Max Plus models, the 25th Anniversary variation boasts a polyurethane midsole with a midfoot shank inspired by the curve of a whale’s tail. The upper is made of breathable mesh, displaying a color gradient that fades from light blue to Varsity Blue to purple to red with a palm pattern. Each color represents one of the famous Air Max colorways. A TPU cage supports the soft upper and mimics the sway of palm trees moving in the breeze.

Our StockX experts like visible Air Max units in the chunky midsole. The Nike Air Max Plus 25th Anniversary was released on November 9, 2023, and retailed at $185.

name: Nike Air Max Plus Tiempo Wolf Grey Black

details.description:
The Nike Air Max Plus Tiempo Wolf Grey Black is an athletic shoe with a curved, stitched leather upper in Wolf Grey, featuring a large foldover tongue. The Nike Swoosh in Black appears on the tongue and sides, while Tiempo branding appears on the rear heel and outsole. The chunky Black outsole displays four visible Air units, and a Metallic Silver tip completes the look.

Nike, the predominant force in American sneaker design, pioneered its Air Max technology beginning in 1987, with the series going on to add another triumph to the brand's innovations. The Air Max Plus Tiempo’s foldover tongue is inspired by traditional football sneaker design, while the Air Max technology in the sole offers solid comfort on the pitch.

In our opinion, the best feature of the Air Max Plus Tiempo is its chunky sole, which balances the aesthetic of the foldover tongue. The Nike Air Max Plus Tiempo Wolf Grey Black released on July 12, 2024, and retailed for $190.

name: Nike Air Max Plus Black Dusty Cactus
Nike Air Max Plus PSG

details.description:
In collaboration with the Paris Saint Germain football club, once again, Nike plays tribute to these great players with the Nike Air Max Plus PSG sneaker, representing the team’s home kit.

This PSG tribute to Nike Air Max delivers a dynamic shoe in the team's traditional colors, blending midnight blue, red, white, and black with gold accents. The show mimics the lines of the team’s jersey on the upper textile. The outer shoe boasts a gold Swoosh, while the structural cage of the shoe provides integrity, which is synonymous with this comfortable, highly supportive shoe. The PSG logo sits on the heel and insole, while Air cushioned units pump up the midsole of this durable and bouncy shoe. 

What we think is the standout feature of the Nike Air Max Plus PSG is the dynamic pattern displayed all over the upper, in a design that resembles waves in the three colors. When released on 1 August 2024, it was priced at $200.

name: Nike Air Max Plus Golf The Masters Augusta Azaleas
Nike Air Max Plus Premium Black Racer Blue

details.description:
The Nike Air Max Plus Premium Black Racer Blue displays a color gradient from black to Phantom to Racer Blue and the shoe’s signature TPU overlays.

The Black Racer Bule Nike Air Max Plus Premium was inspired by nature, where the overlays take on a wavy design that emulates waves or swaying palm trees. They create the feeling of movement across the upper and support the airy mesh. Another nature-inspired element is the midfoot arch, which supports the foot and resembles a whale’s tale. Starting from the heel, the upper fades from black to Racer Blue with a genuine leather mudguard in black wrapping around the shoe. The sole unit includes visible Nike Air units that offer lightweight support and give the sneaker a technical appearance.

Our experts like the bright white Swoosh logos on the side panels. Even though they’re small, in our option, these iconic logos are all the branding the shoe needs. The Nike Air Max Plus Premium Black Racer Blue was released on July 14, 2024, and sold for $190.

name: Nike Air Max Plus Drift Black Anthracite

details.description:
The Nike Air Max Plus Drift Black Anthracite blends a beach-inspired design with performance running in a bold black and anthracite colorway. It features an all-black upper with subtle anthracite accents for a versatile, modern look.

The Black Anthracite Nike Air Max Plus Drift’s upper combines mesh and synthetic materials for breathability and durability. Inspired by beach life, the sneaker’s supportive midfoot arch features a whale’s tail design. The iconic plastic cage’s design lines evoke palm trees and ocean waves, bringing even more beach vibes to the look. Staying true to its running heritage, the sneaker sits atop a performance-ready visible Nike Air unit that provides lightweight cushioning, while a rubber outsole ensures the traction you need.

What our experts love about the Nike Air Max Plus Drift Black Anthracite is its design that blends bold aesthetics with all-day comfort. The sneaker’s wavy design lines give it a dynamic look, while its airy mesh construction and premium cushioning ensure all-day comfort. The sneaker was released on June 26, 2024, for $185.

name: Nike Air Max Plus Aquarius Blue

details.description:
The Nike Air Max Plus Aquarius Blue applies a watery color gradient of Aquarius Blue to the Air Max Plus silhouette.​
​​
​Like other versions of the Nike Air Max Plus, the "Aquarius Blue" iteration features a plastic cage across the upper that resembles waves, ripples, or even palm fronds. Originally designed as a performance running shoe, this sneaker boasts a breathable mesh and synthetic upper with Air units underfoot. The Air units provide lightweight cushioning that doesn’t weigh down the foot. In addition, the rubber outsole offers traction and works with the supportive midfoot arch. This design mimics the shape of a whale’s tail and adds another technical element to the sneaker.​
​​
​Our StockX experts like the polished rubber toe cap because it catches the light and stands out from the textile mudguard elements. The Nike Air Max Plus Aquarius Blue was released on December 12th, 2023, and retailed at $180.

name: Nike Air Max Plus Rebellious Air Fireberry

details.description:
The Nike Air Max Plus Rebellious Air Fireberry dresses the Air Max Plus with an electric colorway of Pure Purple and Fireberry with black and white accents.

At the Rebellious Air Fireberry Nike Air Max Plus, The TPU overlays display a fade from Pure Purple to Fireberry, which matches the gradient of color across the mesh upper. The TPU overlays act as a cage and resemble palms swaying in the breeze or waves. Other nature-inspired accents include the TPU arch beneath the midfoot that looks like a whale tale and features Pure Purple and Fireberry. The sneaker offers visible Air Max cushioning underfoot, which provides support without weighing the foot down, while Air Max branding decorates the cushioned tongue's logo tag. The rubber outsole contains a surprising feature – pops of neon green.

Our experts at StockX like the reflective detailing because it provides visibility in low lighting and gives the sneaker a sporty feel. The Nike Air Max Plus Rebellious Air Fireberry was released on July 12, 2024, and sold for $180.

name: Nike Air Max Terrascape Plus White Pure Platinum

details.description:
The upper of the Nike Air Max Terrascape Plus White Pure Platinum is constructed from durable materials designed to withstand rugged terrain. The combination of synthetic overlays and mesh provides a balance of durability and breathability. The padded collar and tongue provide extra comfort and support around the ankle, reducing the risk of discomfort during outdoor activities.

The outsole of the Nike Air Max Terrascape Plus White Pure Platinum is designed with a multidirectional tread pattern and deep grooves to provide excellent traction on various surfaces. Synthetic overlays are strategically placed on high-wear areas of the shoe, offering added protection against abrasion and rugged terrain.

Our team of experts especially love the Nike's Max Air cushioning technology in the heel, which provides superior impact protection and comfort during hikes and outdoor adventures. It helps absorb shock and reduce fatigue during extended wear. The Nike Air Max Terrascape Plus White Pure Platinum hit the market on November 17th, 2022, with a price tag of $185.

name: Nike Air Max Plus Black Opti Yellow

details.description:
The Nike Air Max Plus Black Opti Yellow is a performance shoe whose design was inspired by flames and beaches.

The Black Opti Yellow Nike Air Max Plus has a mesh upper that fades from a lighter Wolf Grey around the toe box and laces to a Black color around the bottom and heel. Curved shiny black TPU supports run vertically down the upper, resembling flames. A small Nike swoosh appears on each side in Opti Yellow, while a black mudguard and shiny black toe cap support the front half of the shoe. The heel counter is also black leather and features a Tuned Air logo. The design of the arch was inspired by the shape of a whale’s tail, and it also fades into Opty Yellow near the bottom. Air Max units are seen under the heel and forefoot.

Our favorite thing about this shoe is the whale’s tail arch design incorporating Opti Yellow, making it stand out. The Nike Air Max Plus Black Opti Yellow was released on October 22, 2024, for $170.
